Life is hard

An autobiografical piece on the meaninglessness of perpetual existence.

Posted by Nicolas Angelides on November 12, 2018

Existence is pain

Life is just riding a bicycle, except the bike's on fire, and you are on fire, everything's on fire, cause you are in hell.

Posted by Nicolas Angelides on September 03, 1996
